_source.text: 1834 - As you would expect with its cars running second and third after nearly four hours, and closing on the lead Audi, the mood in the Toyota camp is pretty buoyant, as its press spokesman told our Tom Mallett: "We are doing better than expectations, we are running without any trouble so far and to see the cars running P2 is fantastic.
